terms.name: cell
terms.definition: The basic structural, functional, and biological unit of all known living organisms.

terms.name: DNA
terms.definition: Deoxyribonucleic acid, a molecule that carries genetic instructions.

terms.name: enzyme
terms.definition: A protein that catalyzes biochemical reactions.

terms.name: protein
terms.definition: Large biomolecules consisting of one or more long chains of amino acid residues.

terms.name: mitosis
terms.definition: A process of cell division that results in two genetically identical daughter cells.
